actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that members of the uniformed services and the Foreign Service shall be treated as using a principal residence while on official extended duty.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that members of the uniformed services and the Foreign Service shall be treated as using a principal residence while on official extended duty.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that members of the uniformed services and the Foreign Service shall be treated as using a principal residence while on official extended duty.
